Manage and develop ECG (Expert Consulting Group) team. Current duties: 
•	Manage the ECG team through setting tactical direction leveraged against organizational goals (responsible for setting strategic vision for the team and planning the steps in which the team should take to achieve the vision).  
•	Foster global communication within the company extension network through strategy, executive presentation, and strategic informed decision making (work with ECG’s senior management to share best practices leveraging feedback and insights to create customized business strategies that address key customer pain points). 
•	Manage and direct the coordinated work effort of various X.Commerce partners and Magento customers to ensure quality and execution of platform (manage strategic partnerships with Magento merchants and integrators and mentors their decisions during critical phases in project implementation during the entire platform life cycle). 
•	Drive platform innovation and oversee implementation of technological research. 
•	Management and mentorship of technical consultants and supervision of work performance (responsible for managing and evaluating the work performance of the technical consultants comprising X.Commerce’s ECG). ECG Associate Director Magento March 2011  –  April 2012  (1 year 2 months) Managed Expert Consulting Group in Dnepropetrovsk. Improved processes inside department, adopted new technologies and methodologies into a team.
